text: Loja (), formerly Loxa and fully City of the Immaculate Conception of Loja (), is the capital of Ecuador's Loja Province. ==Other websites== *Loja Area Map *Lojanos.com - Virtual community of Loja *Official page of Loja municipality * * www.cronica.com.ec Category:Cities in Ecuador Category:Capitals of Ecuadorian provinces Category:Loja Province
title: Loja, Ecuador
